name: Well Wishers
description:
The truth is this: They will emerge from their Well and judge humanity for what we've done. 

It is the last month of the year, and our last chance to make amends, to heal. We have to come together and show Truth that we are more than our Shame.

We have 31 days.

Well Wishers is a narrative-focused, roleplay-heavy supernatural game. The game is centered around Truth (played by the Game Master (GM)) planning to bring about the apocalypse, and humanity's attempts to avert it. 

Well Wishers directly deals with apocalyptic events, supernatural horror via transformation, community instability, theft, community-wide illness, intergenerational and personal trauma. It's recommended to use the TTRPG Safety Toolkit created by Kienna S.
